script:
1). You still have my business card, don't you?
You do!
I hadn't seen it.
I think I misplaced it. 
2). Could I get a light?
It's too dark.
Sure, here you are. 
I didn't have one.
3). What are we going to do about replacing Martin?
We'll post an advertisement next week. 
We didn't hire anybody yet.
We couldn't have replaced him.
